title: Jeremy Irons
alt: Movies that I know word-for-word, part one
transcript:
[Cueball points at Megan with his mouth open. Jeremy Irons stands behind him.]
Jeremy Irons: But as THICK as you are, pay attention
Jeremy Irons: My words are a matter of PRIDE!My goal: To make enough money to hire Jeremy Irons, the voice of Scar from The Lion King, to follow me around and do my dialogue.
